name: Brose Fahrzeugteile GmbH & Co. Kommanditgesellschaft, Coburg
goal: Brose is a system supplier of the international automotive industry and the world's fifth-largest family-owned automotive supplier. The company develops and produces mechatronic systems for vehicle doors and seats as well as electric motors and drives. More than 25,000 employees at 60 locations in 23 countries generate 6,1 Billion euros in  turnover.
interests: Competition, Energy, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation
euInitiatives: Energy & Climate Policy, TTIP, Tax Policy
